entry.title: Friday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or light snow beginning this evening and ending before morning. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:43 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 1.
